hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ls -al /app > /dev/null cd /app ls -al /app/JenkinsHome > /dev/null if [ -d ".git" ]; then rm -r .git > /dev/null fi #rm -r /app/JenkinsHome/.git 2> /dev/null git init git config user.email "lv105ro@gmail.com" git config user.name "lv105ro" git remote add origin https://lv105ro:git123qwASD@github.com/SS-IT-Academy/JenkinsCI.git git status printf "/JenkinsHome/jobs/save/builds/*/log" > .gitignore git add . # remove back-up wars after update if [ -f "jenkins.war.bak" ]; then git rm -f jenkins.war.bak fi if [ -f "jenkins.war.tmp" ]; then git rm -f jenkins.war.tmp fi
git commit -m "Sync ci repository" git status #git pull origin master git push --force origin master
